node.text:
@CryptoCrunchApp - New Crypto App allows consumers to make payments in BTC.💥💥💥👇🔽👇🔽
.
.
A new Bitcoin app aims to revolutionize how everyday people interact with Bitcoin. By using a debit card or bank account, the Strike app allows consumers to make payments in BTC. The transactions are settled in dollars which get directly deposited to a merchant’s bank account. According to developer and Zap CEO Jack Mallers, anyone can link their bank account directly to Bitcoin, allowing shoppers to easily spend it and enabling merchants to simply accept it without having to interact with it.💥💥🔽👇🔽.
.
.

Brad Sherman is now the chairman for the Subcommittee on Investor Protection.

The same man that said, “We should prohibit U.S. persons from buying or mining cryptocurrencies.”

node.text:
Anthony Pompliano, co-founder of Morgan Creek Capital, says that his confidence in Bitcoin is stronger than ever before, He teases the crypto community with confidence about BTC price in the future. He mentioned that his optimism on BTC is higher than ever before, Pompliano mentioned great trading volumes on CME and other crypto exchanges, which, as per him, means that both institutional and retail investors are now interested in BTC. Another thing that he mentioned was the approaching halving of Bitcoin, when BTC gets more scarce. .#⃣ checkout #cryptocrunchapp .

Amazing figure of 1.2 million new users have entered the market since mid July, as Willy Woo, the on-chain expert analysizes the data and noted that this figure excludes off-chain users on exchanges. There's also a healthy competition between Bitcoin and Ethereum resulting to Bitcoin’s network adoption growth, and price increase. William Clemente bullish predictions places bitcoin's price attempting a $49,000/$50,000 price level. 💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: Coinbase Aims to Become Amazon of Digital Assets Says CEO.🚀✴️🚀✴️

Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong revealed during Q2 2021 earnings call that plan of the Nasdaq-listed exchange is to Become the Amazon of digital assets by listing every assets that is legal on the exchange inline with the goal of decentralization. Armstrong shared that Coinbase vision has always been about the long term. Coinbase listed 22 new tokens including DOGE, generated $2 billion in revenue during Q2 2021.💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp:Cardano's Smart Contract Launch Date Finally Released By Tim Harrison.🚀✴️🚀✴️

Tim Harrison, IOHK's marketing and communications director released the date for cardano's mainnet launch of the Alonzo hard fork to be Sept. 12, which will allow users run smart contracts on the largest proof of stake (PoS) blockchain. Nigel Hemsley, Cardano's head of delivery gives updates on the teams effort to make the launch a reality, The testnet will be on Sept. 1 as an insight on how it'd turnout on production environment.💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: Mexican Billionaire Says His Bank Will Support Bitcoin Soon For Clients.🚀✴️🚀✴️

Mexican businessman Ricardo Salinas Pliego, founder and chairman of Grupo Salinas shared in a recent tweet that his bank “Banco Azteca” will soon start accepting Bitcoin. The billionaire with a net worth $15.6 billion added laser eyes to his Twitter profile picture indicating that he completely support Bitcoin. @CryptoCrunchApp:Twitter Could Link Every Account to Lightning Wallet, Twitter CEO Suggests.🚀✴️🚀✴️

Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey responded to a tweet that it’s possible for every Twitter account to be linked to a Lightning Network-enabled Bitcoin wallet. This was a response to a tweet that said “every account on Twitter should have a wallet address for storing NFTs.” The Twitter CEO agreed that it will boost Ethereum ecosystem. Dorsey had announced earlier in June that Twitter would integrate the Lightning Network. 💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: Argentina Open to Adopting Bitcoin Says President Alberto Fernandez.🚀✴️🚀✴️

The president of Argentina, Alberto Fernandez, opined during an interview that it’s possible to adopt central bank digital currency and there is every reason to follow the footsteps of El Salvador to improve the country’s economy by adopting Bitcoin as legal tender. Fernandez said “Perhaps that is a good path to take” because it completely nullifies inflationary effect which is one of the issues Argentine deals with. 💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: Crypto Exchanges To Be Legalized By Iran’s Government Tax Authority.🚀✴️🚀✴️

The Iranian National Tax Administration (INTA) plans on developing a legal framework for the taxation of crypto trading platforms operating in the country, this was moved in response to Iranian President Hassan Rouhani’s initiative for a legal framework for crypto trading. This will mean that exchanges are allowed to convert currency while keeping track of transactions, and also set up a higher mark on transactions within decentralized exchanges. 💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: Ethereum Has Burned $100million Worth of ETH Since Launch of EIP-1559.🚀✴️🚀✴️

Ethereum’s London upgrade launched EIP-1559 which initiated Ethereum transaction fee burn completely changing the fee structure of Ethereum network. Since the upgrade, about 31,000 ETH worth over $100 million has been burned out of circulation instead of going into circulation by going to the miners. 10% of the burned fees came from transactions on NFT marketplace OpenSea, followed by Uniswap and Axie Infinity.💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

@CryptoCrunchApp: KISS Rockstar Gene Simmons Says He is “All in” On Bitcoin.🚀✴️🚀✴️

KISS frontman and rock legend Gene Simmons said that he’s “all in” on Bitcoin and he believes that Bitcoin will be trading at $60,000 by the beginning of 2022. He also said that he bought more in the dip. According to the rockstar, he had a Bitcoin portfolio worth seven figures back in February. @CryptoCrunchApp: Investment Custodian Neuberger Berman Develops Plans Adding Bitcoin And Ether Exposure.🚀✴️🚀✴️

The multi-billion-dollar asset manager, Neuberger Berman plans to get exposure to Bitcoin and Ethereum derivatives linked to agriculture, livestock, energy and precious metals etc., investments in bitcoin trusts and exchange-traded funds and investment platforms through a subsidiary firm. According to Neuberger Berman, Crypto investment should be as an option when there's inflationary future increase and economic uncertainties. This filling by Berman notes a minimum investment of $5M.💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇

Korea's Leading Payments Service Provider GME Remittance partners with SBI Ripple Asia, a subsidiary of Ripple, to enable faster payments. Also, 65% of the percent are from the smaller cities in India, even A fiat payments gateway provider out of Bengaluru, Razorpay revealed 54% of traffic on its network came from investors in smaller cities. 💥🚀💥🚀🔽👇🔽👇
